plugin.title: Positioning
plugin.compatibility: Compatible with 4.1; positioning only works from 4.4.
plugin.author: LongTail Video
plugin.description: This is a simple plugin showing a red block you can freely position with flashvars. This only works from 4.4, so this template also shows how to do fallbacks for previous versions. You're free to build your own plugins on top of this code.

flashvar.name: position
flashvar.description: Position of the plugin. Can be "over", "left", "right", "top" or "bottom".

flashvar.name: size
flashvar.description: Width or height of the plugin when not over the display.
